public class AdminEventsActivity extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity implements com.example.own_example.services.AdminEventService.AdminEventsListener
Activity for managing campus events by administrators. Allows admins to create, edit, delete and send updates about campus events. Implements AdminEventService.AdminEventsListener to handle events from the service.

    • parseDateTime

      private Date parseDateTime(String date, String time) throws Exception
      Parse a date and time string into a Date object.
      Parameters:
      date - The date string in format yyyy-MM-dd
      time - The time string in format HH:mm
      Returns:
      A Date object representing the combined date and time
      Throws:
      Exception - If the date/time cannot be parsed
